translations: 拉克酒，雷基酒（产于东欧和中东的烈性酒）

sentences.sentence: Mr Raki I Go away! You're hurting my ears!
sentences.translation: 莱科先生我走开！ 你在折磨我的耳朵！

sentences.sentence: The group recently added 24-year-old Rami Raki, aka "Ram Rak, " who grew up in Manchester, England.
sentences.translation: 该组合新近又来了一名在英格兰曼彻斯特长大的24岁歌手Rami Raki aka "Ram Rak。
